name: DreamRush
description:
DreamRush

DreamRush opens up for a new amazing space for you to use your creativity and create your own personal world. Get your fantasy mood on, build with unique entities and get the cashflow going to create the world of your dreams. 

early access

We are still testing and developing on the engine and game. New objects and features will come continuously.

If you have any question or Bug, please leave your comment or contact us by following links.
